input.sentences: first came the procession by candle .
the group arrived and waited solemnly by the windows .
afterwards they all enjoyed the buffet dinner .
that gave them energy to dance the night away .
they all danced as the band played along .
output.sentences: The evil ghost of Thanksgiving Past has come again.
A short ceremony cleansed the ghosts from the turkey and stuffing
The feast began, the guests ate the stuffing and flesh.
Full of stuffing and cranberry sauce, the whirling commenced.
The band played on through the night.
